report.member.001: Purple U Co., Ltd. membership card
report.member.009: We sincerely welcome everyone who has become a member of the Purple U family that shares happiness.
report.member.010:
Purple U puts its soul into each product, delivering health and beauty to people who practice happiness and dreaming of you.
It contains the meaning of people sharing happiness through honest business opportunities.
report.member.011:
Purple U's products are made based on naturalism. Honest products in partnership with the world's leading R&D companies.
Honest price. We pursue true network marketing that creates a happy world together through the philosophy of an honest compensation plan.
report.member.012:
First of all, for the success and happiness of one-person businesses with dreams and passion by caring and respecting consumers and consumers.
We promise to do our best.
report.member.013: Purple U will achieve and grow with the love of each and every one of you.
report.member.014: I wish you to achieve even bigger dreams with Purple U.
report.member.017: Ⅰ. We will listen to what our customers say.
report.member.018:
Happiness is practice. We will sincerely listen to the opinions of businesses and consumers so that you, who are dreaming, can be happy.
We will work together to achieve a happy and successful life.
report.member.019: Ⅱ. We will put customer safety first.
report.member.020:
The best quality in cooperation with leading R&D companies, efficacy. We will focus on developing safe products.
We will establish a leading corporate culture that complies with the environment and regulations.
report.member.021: Ⅲ. Honesty is our basic philosophy.
report.member.022:
Honest product. honest price. With an honest compensation plan, dreaming independent entrepreneurs can be happy and successful.
A company offering business opportunities. We will do our best to make products that satisfy both businesses and customers.
report.member.023: Ⅳ. We will do our best to contribute to society.
report.member.024: For corporate ethics and sustainability, we will operate the company transparently and faithfully and strive to contribute to society.
report.member.025: Ⅴ. We will expand the market on the world stage.
report.member.026:
Purple U aims to become a global brand. Since its inception, we have developed products targeting the global market.
We will expand the market so that independent businesses can provide business opportunities on the global stage using the domestic position as a bridgehead.
